local_intent: Detect and compute top grasp for red_bottle, approach/align, then grasp at goal_pose with retries until stable.
assumptions: Approach to red_bottle within 0.01 m tolerance is feasible
coherence_with_global: Implements the grasp phase of the global plan: detect -> compute grasp (top) -> approach/align -> grasp -> verify stability, reattempting up to 3 times as per recovery guidance.
